title: Printer's Sample Book, 1882–83
medium:
Medium: leather, paper, cotton and wool
Technique: printed plain weave and 2/2 twill
creditline: Gift of Frederick J. Whitehead from the collection compiled by his father Cornelius Whitehead at the Pacific Print Works of Lawrence, Massachusetts
description: Small notebook with handwritten formulas for dyestuffs to be used for printing textiles. Contains 195 samples of printed fabric. Inside cover pasted with newspaper clippings.

tombstone.epitaph:
Printer's Sample Book, 1882–83.
1882–83. Medium: leather, paper, cotton and wool
Technique: printed plain weave and 2/2 twill. Gift of Frederick J. Whitehead from the collection compiled by his father Cornelius Whitehead at the Pacific Print Works of Lawrence, Massachusetts. 1945-55-21.
